##  CURRENT EXHIBITIONS

[](https://themuseum.org/enduring-concepts/ "Enduring Concepts")

###  Enduring Concepts 

Enduring Concepts examines how different artists approach the themes of people, place, emotion, and spirituality prevalent in the AMoA collection. These topics have universal reach and connect people across various backgrounds and demographics through works created in a variety of color palettes, compositional styles, as well as variety in the use of line. The pieces…

###  Emerge 

EMERGE: New Orleans Artists from the Saratoga Collection November 1 – February 14 2025 Opening – November 7 2025 Curated post-Katrina by Terrence Sanders-Smith To commemorate 20 years since the devastation caused by Hurricane Katrina, the Alexandria Museum of Art presents the first public viewing of the Saratoga Collection. admission_text:
##  Museum Hours & Admission 

The staff and volunteers at the Alexandria Museum of Art look forward to your visit!

### Gallery Hours

  * **10 AM – 5 PM** | Tuesday – Friday
  * **10 AM – 4 PM** | Saturday
  * **Closed** on Sunday, Monday, and Major Holidays

### Admission Prices

  * **$5** | Adults
  * **$4** | Senior Citizens / Students / Military
  * **FREE** | Children under 4 years of age
  * _Call for Group Rates_

### Reciprocal Museums

AMoA Members also receive free admission at the following participating museums across the U.S.*

  * [North American Reciprocal Museum (NARM) Membership Program](https://narmassociation.org/)
  * [Southeastern Museum Reciprocal Museum (SERM) Membership Program](https://www.semcdirect.net/reciprocal)
  * American Alliance of Museums

Individuals presenting a membership card from the participating organizations listed above will receive free admission to AMoA for the card bearer.

*See Membership Level descriptions for details.

To find Alexandria hotels nearby, visit [Explore Alexandria Pineville](https://explorealexandriapineville.com/listings-category/accommodations/)

### Free Admission Information

  * **Free Admission** to the public every **Second Saturday** of the month!
  * **Free Admission** to all AMoA Members and LSUA Students, Faculty, and Staff with ID.
